If you like fps class shooters and wacky hats, this is the game for you. It's great gameplay, variety and replayability will keep you coming back more than once. It's easy to learn and fun to play.

I've played this game of the course of an entire year, and I'm still not tired of it. This is a great, ridiculous game to get. The community is loving, and loves to trade. Casual is amazing, and so is competitive. All around this game is great, with a lot to offer! Get it now! :D

Team Fortress 2 is a team based game. You choose your class and work with your team to achieve a goal. This means that in order to succeed, you must only play one class for 500 hours straight, and then carry your entire team on a casual match until the entire other team leaves meaning you get autobalanced and so get more points at the end of the round, as well as carrying that team meaning everyone on the first team leaves meaning you get even more points, and once the cycle has finished through time, or maybe another tryhard just like you joins the game, you level up a billion times, and once you hit casual level 150 you uninstall the game and go play Farming Simulator 2017. And then realise you just wasted 500 hours.

Team Fortress 2 the game that at the start i played a little then suddenly i got hooked and now it's the only game i play.
Its sad to see it losing it's community because of it's new blizzard clone: Overwatch. However after a decade of it's release its still been able to survive. The granddaddy of the team based fps genre. By far one of the most addictive games i played. Fast paced combat and classes with funny personality's with attributes and weaknesses. I highly recommend to anyone who wants something different than the generic fps's the current industry has to offer and Hopefully it will stay strong with the years to come.

Oyun 2007 yılında yapılmasına rağmen o yıl için bile çok iyi.Oyunda 9 class var.Scout,Soldier,Medic,Demoman,Engineer,Heavy,Spy,Sniper ve Pyro.Hepsinin arasında çok fark yok ama bazilarinda var.Oyun 2 takımdan oluşuyor.BLU ve RED.Yani kısaca oyunu öneriyorum
